messageInput.placeholderWithRag:

hero.title: AI-Powered Data Warehouse
hero.subtitle: Development Platform
hero.description: Meet DataNova, your intelligent data warehouse development platform. Powered by large language models and AI agents, it transforms how you build, manage, and analyze data warehouses with automated insights and intelligent recommendations.
hero.footnote: * Empowering data teams with AI-driven intelligence.

settings.title: DataNova Settings
settings.mcpConfigDescription: DataNova uses the standard JSON MCP config to create a new server.
settings.pasteConfigBelow: Paste your config below and click "Add" to add new servers.

general.title: General
general.maxPlanIterationsDescription: Set to 1 for single-step planning. Set to 2 or more to enable re-planning.
general.maxStepsOfPlan: Max steps of a research plan
general.maxStepsDescription: By default, each research plan has 3 steps.
general.maxSearchResultsDescription: By default, each search step has 3 results.

mcp.title: MCP Servers
mcp.description: The Model Context Protocol boosts DataNova by integrating external tools for data pipeline management, schema analysis, query optimization, and more. Click here to

reportStyle.chooseDesc: Select the writing style for your research reports. Different styles are optimized for different audiences and purposes.
reportStyle.academicDesc: Formal, objective, and analytical with precise terminology
reportStyle.popularScienceDesc: Engaging and accessible for general audience
reportStyle.newsDesc: Factual, concise, and impartial journalistic style

footer.quote: Revolutionizing data warehouse development with AI intelligence.

welcome.description: Welcome to ðŸš€ DataNova, an AI-powered data warehouse development platform built on cutting-edge language models, helps you design schemas, optimize queries, and build intelligent data pipelines.

conversationStarters: Design a star schema for an e-commerce analytics data warehouse

Create a data pipeline to process streaming transaction data

deepThinkingTooltip.title: Deep Analysis Mode: {status}
deepThinkingTooltip.description: When enabled, DataNova will use reasoning model ({model}) to generate more thoughtful data architecture plans.

investigationTooltip.title: Data Discovery Mode: {status}
investigationTooltip.description: When enabled, DataNova will perform a quick analysis of your data sources before planning. This is useful for understanding data patterns and relationships.

messages.replayModeDescription: You're now in DataNova's replay mode. Click the "Play" button on the right to start.

caseStudies.title: Case Studies
caseStudies.description: See DataNova in action through data warehouse development scenarios.

cases.title: Design an e-commerce analytics data warehouse schema
cases.description: The analysis demonstrates how to create a star schema for e-commerce analytics with proper fact and dimension tables.

cases.title: Optimize SQL query performance for large datasets
cases.description: The study shows various techniques to improve query performance including indexing strategies and query rewriting.

cases.title: Build a real-time data pipeline for streaming data
cases.description: The research provides a comprehensive guide on setting up real-time data pipelines using modern streaming technologies.

cases.title: Implement data quality monitoring and alerts
cases.description: The study demonstrates how to set up automated data quality checks and alerting systems for data warehouses.

cases.title: Design a data governance framework
cases.description: The analysis provides a detailed framework for implementing data governance policies and procedures.

cases.title: Migrate legacy data warehouse to modern cloud platform
cases.description: The research outlines strategies and best practices for migrating from traditional data warehouses to cloud-native solutions.

cases.title: Implement dimensional modeling for financial reporting
cases.description: The study shows how to design and implement dimensional models specifically for financial reporting requirements.

cases.title: Set up automated data testing and validation pipelines
cases.description: The research demonstrates how to implement comprehensive data testing frameworks to ensure data reliability.

coreFeatures.title: Core Features
coreFeatures.description: Discover what makes DataNova the ultimate data warehouse development platform.

features.name: AI-Powered Schema Design
features.description: Leverage AI to design optimal data warehouse schemas with automated recommendations for fact tables, dimensions, and relationships.

features.name: Intelligent Query Optimization
features.description: Get AI-driven suggestions to optimize your SQL queries for better performance and reduced costs.

features.name: Automated Data Pipeline Generation
features.description: Build robust data pipelines with AI assistance, from ETL processes to real-time streaming workflows.

features.name: Smart Data Quality Monitoring
features.description: Implement AI-powered data quality checks and anomaly detection to ensure data reliability and accuracy.

features.name: Collaborative Development Environment
features.description: Work seamlessly with your team using integrated development tools and version control for data warehouse projects.

multiAgent.title: AI Agent Architecture
multiAgent.description: Experience intelligent data warehouse development with our specialized AI agents working together.

joinCommunity.title: Join the DataNova Community
joinCommunity.description: Contribute to the future of AI-powered data warehouse development. Collaborate with data engineers and architects worldwide.
